    • optimizeParameters

      public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> optimizeParameters​(java.lang.String[] params)
      Optimize input parameters, the parameter must be in "parameter" if it contains space. The order is not important in this method.
      Parameters:
      params - Input parameters.
      Returns:
      A set of optimized parameters.

    • optimizeParametersAsList

      public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> optimizeParametersAsList​(java.lang.String[] params)
      Optimize input parameters, the parameter must be in "parameter" if it contains space. It optimizes parameters by order from input.
      Parameters:
      params - Input parameters.
      Returns:
      A List of optimized parameters.

    • optimizeSingleParameter

      public static java.lang.String optimizeSingleParameter​(java.lang.String input)
      Optimize a single parameter, the parameter must be in "parameter" if it contains space.
      Parameters:
      input - Input parameter.
      Returns:
      A optimized parameter.
